forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 17C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain developing later in the day. High 62F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Potential for flooding rains. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Potential for flooding rains. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low around 45F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with light rain early. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 50F. SE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High near 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.
